questions.question: Tyrone stole 46 pieces of chicken from KFC, how much in watermelon does Tyrone have to pay back if 1 watermelon is 2 pieces of chicken?

In a parallel universe where math is based on jellybeans, if a logarithm of a jellybean equals the square root of 27 divided by the number of gnomes juggling flamingos, what is the average number of flamingos required to balance the equation, given that the gnomes use 5.8 kilograms of invisible frosting per flamingo?

choices.choice1: 9 gnomes and a partridge in a pear tree
choices.choice3: 42 flamingos with a side of calculus

questions.question: What is the minimum number of transfers needed to travel from Ikebukuro Station to Ueno Station?

choices.choice1: Arakawakuyakushomae - Minowabashi - Minowa - Naka-okachimachi - Ueno-okachimachi - Shinjuku-nishiguchi - Shinjuku - Hachioji - Takao - Shiotsu
choices.choice2: Arakawakuyakushomae - Minowa - Naka-okachimachi - Ueno-okachimachi - Shinjuku-nishiguchi - Shiotsu
choices.choice3: Arakawakuyakushomae - Minowa - Naka-okachimachi - Ueno-okachimachi - Shinjuku-nishiguchi - Hachioji - Shiotsu
choices.choice4: Arakawakuyakushomae - Minowabashi - Minowa - Naka-okachimachi - Ueno - Shinjuku-nishiguchi - Shinjuku - Hachioji - Takao - Shiotsu
